roleset.name: remove horn
roleset.note: DEHORN-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from dehorn.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: In his defence, Beach stated he dehorned the cattle partly as a result of a complaint from the woman that recently purchased 16 of his cattle.
example.arg: partly as a result of a complaint from the woman that recently purchased 16 of his cattle.
